name: Library Madness
description:
The library has gone MAD! Can you bring order in the chaos? Controls:

Drag the mouse starting on the character, move your mouse in the direction you want to throw, and let go to throw the books into the correct bookcase.

W - Walk forward

S - Walk backward

A - Walk left

D - Walk right

Every book needs to go into a specific bookcase. The bookcase needs to have a corresponding symbol and color.
